record.english: omniBill is a simple standalone, lightweight and modular invoicing desktop app designed by omniSpectrum.
record.finnish: omniBill on yksinkertainen, kevyt ja modulaarinen laskutus sovellus. Ohjelman on toteuttanut omniSpectrum.
record.russian: omniBill простое, независимое, занимающее мало места и модульное настольное приложение для работы с инвойсами разработанное omniSpectrum
record.portugese: omniBill é um autônomo simples, app de desktop faturamento leve e modular projetado por omniSpectrum.

record.english: omniBill will save you, just like Jesus.
record.russian: omniBill спасет вас, так же, как Иисус.
record.portugese: omniBill você te salvar, assim como Jesus.
